sliderFeedback: Please move the slider at least once.

taskDescription: In this task, you will hear a person speak and see a series of sliders asking you to rate that person on the basis of their voice alone.
@TRANSLATE:In this task, you will hear a person speak and see a series of sliders asking you to rate that person on the basis of their voice alone.
taskInstruction: Please use the sliders to record the degree to which you agree or disagree with each statement. You will only hear each voice once. However, if any problem occurs during the task, for example the audio doesn't play properly, please speak to the researcher.

@TRANSLATE:Please use the sliders to record the degree to which you agree or disagree with each statement. You will only hear each voice once. However, if any problem occurs during the task, for example the audio doesn't play properly, please speak to the researcher.
taskPracticeDescription: The first example will be a practice item so that you can familiarise yourself with the task. After you have completed the practice item, you will have the opportunity to speak to the researcher to ask any questions you might have about the task.

@TRANSLATE:The first example will be a practice item so that you can familiarise yourself with the task. After you have completed the practice item, you will have the opportunity to speak to the researcher to ask any questions you might have about the task.
taskNextStep: Click on begin practice when you're ready.

playbackError: Audio could not be played. Click to try again.
abortedError: 错误: 播放已被取消。
networkError: Error: Audio couldn't be loaded due to a network error.
错误: 由于网络错误，音频无法播放。
decodeError: Error: Audio could not be decoded.
错误: 无法解码音频。
formatError: Error: Audio file not found or format not supported.
错误: 无法找到音频文件或不支持该文件。
unknownError: 错误: 发生了一个未知的错误。

statement: The person in this recording sounds...
instructions: Please use the sliders to record your response.
@TRANSLATE:Please use the sliders to record your response.

completeMessage: You've completed the practice session. If you have any questions at this point please let the researcher know, otherwise click Continue to begin the task.
@TRANSLATE:You've completed the practice session. If you have any questions at this point please let the researcher know, otherwise click Continue to begin the task.
errorMessage: It seems you’ve missed some items. Click Continue to have another look and make sure you’ve moved each slider at least once. The one’s you’ve missed should show up in red. When you’ve moved all the red sliders, click Next again.

@TRANSLATE:It seems you’ve missed some items. Click Continue to have another look and make sure you’ve moved each slider at least once. The one’s you’ve missed should show up in red. When you’ve moved all the red sliders, click Next again.

secTitle: Thank you for completing the Voice Rating task!
感谢你完成了语音评级任务!
thankYouMessage: You have now completed the AGT Voice Rating task. Your data has been saved.
你现在已经完成了任务。你的数据已被保存。
followOnInstructions: Please click “Continue” when you’re ready to continue.
当你准备继续时，请点击 “继续”。
